channel.title: WillowTree on Patrick Gatewood's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in WillowTree on Patrick Gatewood's Blog

item.title: How to Adapt Existing Apps for SwiftUI
item.description: Now that iOS 14 has been released to the public, SwiftUI and Combine are looking more and more attractive as you choose how to build your next greenfield app. But what about your existing applications? If you’re ready to drop iOS 12 and blaze new trails with SwiftUI, congratulations–and prepare yourself for an exciting journey. So you’ve shipped your app’s iOS 13 updates, added dark mode, and dropped iOS 12 support… now what?

item.title: How to Have a Successful Internship
item.description: Whether you’ve just landed an exciting internship for next year or you’re right in the middle of an internship at your dream agency, it’s up to you to get the most out of your experience. You decide what you take away from it, so check out these guidelines on how to design your internship to help you grow as an individual, your way. Full article: https://willowtreeapps.com/ideas/how-to-have-a-successful-internship
